file_content.text: What? The alarms didn't sound. How did you get in here?
It's why I'm here that's important.
Doesn't matter.
We know why you're here.
So Baras's most deadly apprentice has finally found us. My master has been on to you from the beginning.
He knows the rift between you and your master is a ruse. Painstakingly orchestrated to get you close enough to strike. So, drop the act.
Relax. I'm not the enemy.
Take it easy.
We know who and what you are.
Whoever's in charge of protecting this place should be shot.
Your security here stinks.
That would be me. And I guess I'll have to crack down on things here. After dealing with you, of course.
I am no longer Darth Baras's apprentice.
You're mistaken.
Yes, yes. We've all heard about Baras betraying you. No one's buying it.
Save us all a lot of trouble and get Vowrawn here now.
Fetch him.
Oh, don't worry, he'll come to survey your remains.
Please, enlighten me.
Has he now?
Vowrawn can smell Baras's ploys a thousand light years away.
Vowrawn and I seek the same goal. My sole purpose is to destroy Darth Baras.
Listen to me.
So stubborn. We'll see your tune change when you're bleeding to death.
You won't believe anything I say, will you?
This is futile, isn't it?
Say that you're Baras's stooge, and I'll believe you.
But either way, I have to kill you.
Why waste time trying to convince a lackey?
I tire of this. [Attack]
Die, assassin!
